transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Good afternoon sir, main Mayank baat kar raha hun IndiaMART se aapka new account manager. Ye Chandrak Enterprises mein baat ho rahi hai kya, Harpal ji?
Executive: Haan, boliye.
Customer: Haan, ji sir ye main aapka naya account manager hun.
Executive: Ye aapne ek concern open kiya tha na aapke account manager ke regarding.
Executive: Haan, haan, ji ji. To abhi aapka new account manager main hun. Aapko kya issue aa raha tha sir bataiye mujhe main concern se le leta hun aapka.
Customer: Sir abhi renewal kiya maine, abhi renewal kiya aath din pehle.
Executive: Haan, haan, ji ji.
Customer: To unhone renewal ke liye renewal ke baad kuch call bhi nahi kiya mujhe service related.
Executive: Achha service related koi call nahi kiya. Koi nahi sir dekhiye abhi main aapka account manager mere ko hire kar diya gaya hai abhi. Matlab mujhe assign kar diya gaya hai aapka account. To abhi aap pehle mera number save kar lijiyega Mayank naam hai mera Mayank Rawat. Main aapka account manager hun. Aapko kuch bhi koi issue hota hai to aap mujhe text kijiyega ab iske regarding. Baaki to unhone wo changes kiye ki nahi sirf dekhiye na wo account pe mere jo unhone bola tha ki update karenge wo sab products listing karenge Google mein sab.
Executive: Haan, haan, listing wo sari cheeze main kar dunga main wahi cheeze keh raha hun ki jaise aapko product add karne ke liye bola tha kya kya cheeze add karne ke liye bola tha wo sari cheeze ab main karunga usme. Aap nishchint rahiye bas aap mujhe bata dijiye ki unhone kya kya kaha tha aapko kya kya cheeze guide ki thi to main uske according bata dunga kyuki yaha pe dekhiye abhi aapka jo catalog hai ye ek minute ha sir TrustSeal service use kar rahe hai sahi hai right sir aap. Haan to TrustSeal mein aapke ye product automatically 212 product isme add hai aapke jisme aapka kuch product aise hai jinka score bahut kam hai sir aapka.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Ji. Haan to wo cheeze correct karni hai to uske liye main ye sari cheeze aapki correct kar dunga. Thik hai? Baaki jo aapne bataya tha listing mapping wo aapke product hai. Abhi to aap buyleads consume kar rahe hai na sir aapka business conversion ho raha hai na sir aapka.
Customer: Ji. Thik thaak ho rahi hai. Sunday ko call kariye.
Executive: Haan ji. To sir main ek kaam karta hun main aapke sath mein ek video meeting schedule kar de raha hun aapki. Aapka jo bhi concern ho aap mujhe apni screen share karke aapke jo ye matlab catalog mein thoda score bhi kam hai na aapka main wo bhi enrich kar dunga sir. Thik hai? To aap mujhe koi suitable time bata dijiye jab aap available rahenge kyuki aur phir aur ek aur concern tha ye jo aapne ye concern open kiya tha na ticket open ki thi to main isko close kar sakta hun sir abhi?
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Haan ji ji main ab iska concern close kar de raha hun. Baaki aap mujhe koi suitable time bata dijiye jab aap jo hai matlab video meeting ke liye available rahenge taaki main aapka matlab aapko sari cheeze achhe se guide kar dun aur jo jo aap matlab aapko jo purane account manager the unhone aapko kaha tha ki aapko ye ye cheeze add karni hai usme jo bhi hai to wo sari cheeze kar dunga. Abhi aapke matlab product add karne ke liye to kaha tha sir unhone aapko ki matlab aapke 212 product add hai abhi aapke aur bhi product hai isme?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Sorry sir bol rahe hai aap?
Customer: Aur bhi hai. Main aapko ek sir isko ek ghante mein call karta hun aapko chalega?
Executive: Haan, haan, ji ji koi nahi aap mujhe ek ghante mein call kar lijiyega. Thik hai? Baaki main aapka concern close kar de raha hun. Thik hai aapka bhi jo aapka concern hai. Baaki aap mera number save karke mujhe ek ghante mein call kar lijiyega.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Thik hai sir? Okay sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer says previous executive didn't call after renewal.

- Wants to update products and listing on Google.

- Catalog score is low.



Resolution:

- Executive introduced himself as new account manager.

- Offered to schedule a video meeting.

- Agreed to close the open ticket.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will call back in an hour.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- renewal, account manager, product listing, catalog score
